detail_desc: Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, satin ribbons that tie at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a slightly wider neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves and a seam at the hips. Frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Hard smartphone case in plastic and imitation leather with a padded heart on the front. Fits iPhone 6/6s.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with close-fitting cuffs.

Suit trousers in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases front and back. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Joggers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Sleeveless, cropped, rib-knit top. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps.

Studio Collection. Cape in a sturdy wool and polyester weave with buttons at the sides so it can easily be transformed into a gilet. Large notch lapels, buttons down the front and defined, dropped shoulders with a large shoulder tab and button. Belt loops with a tie belt at the waist, wide welt front pockets at the top and a jetted inner pocket. Lined. The wool content of the cape is recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey, one ribbed and one with an all-over print.
Short, straight-cut coat in bouclé made from a wool blend. Double-breasted with notch lapels and large patch front pockets. Lined.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

prod_name: Perrie HW Dnm Lace Up Shorts
detail_desc: Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, button fly, eyelets and lacing at the sides and raw-edge hems.

Short, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Opening with ties at the front, gathers at the shoulders and a seam at the waist with decorative lacing at the sides. Straight skirt with a rounded hem.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Jumper knitted in marled cotton with twisted seams at the sides and asymmetric ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded, printed slippers with appliqués and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a French front, resort collar with a concealed button and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish and fringes. Size 60x180 cm.

Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist, a flared skirt in two layers of tulle and an underskirt with a tulle flounce at the hem. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Dress in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with an opening at the top and small, frilled collar with a drawstring that ties at the neck. Short, wide sleeves with a flounce, a gathered seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at one side and a long, flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket washed denim jeans in a slightly looser fit with embroidered details, a regular waist, slightly lower crotch, and zip fly and button. Tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and hard-worn details.
Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Ankle-length leggings in cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and sections with seams and pleats on the legs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Wide trousers in a cool weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Calf-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly, jetted back pockets and slim, straight legs..

Dress in organic cotton jersey with a glittery, layered tulle skirt. Round neckline with a press-stud on the shoulders, a gathered seam with a decorative bow at the waist and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Sandals in sturdy canvas and imitation suede with lacing at the top, covered heels and long straps that tie around the ankles and have imitation suede tassels at the ends. Imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
3/4-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, straight, wide legs with a pleat at the side, concealed pockets in the side seams and fake back pockets.
Long-sleeved cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with an opening and ties.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cold shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with elastication at the shoulders. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Wide jumper in a fine, sturdy knit with low dropped shoulders, balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and ribbing at the neckline and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections at the back and a racer back.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Suede loafers with a decorative seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Wide top in linen jersey with a turtle neck and short cap sleeves.
Wide top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with raw edges and a raw-edge hem.

Blouse in a crisp weave made from a cotton blend with a sweetheart neckline, elasticated seam under the bust and smocking at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and narrow, concealed elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Ankle boots in sturdy jersey with pointed toes and a soft, stretchy shaft. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
